column2: this place deserves every possible star. From the old fashions to the bone marrow to the filet and potatoes
column3: I think I hit some kind of record for most uses of "oh my god" in a single sitting. I really
column4: really wish I lived in Chicago
column5: but also kind of don't because my pant size would increase substantially and my bank account would be overdrawn due to hitting this place up way too often. Did I mention our awesome waiter Joel and the delicious free glass of wine they sometimes give out thanks to their byob corkage fee? I will be back.
